nodes.description: 伊斯兰堡基督徒与穆斯林在拉合尔Gulshan Iqbal公园庆祝复活节
nodes.support_text: Islamabad, Pakistan (CNN) On Easter Sunday, a crisp spring day, some of the city's Christian population mingled with their Muslim neighbors, celebrating in a neighborhood park

nodes.description: 自杀式爆炸在公园内发生，造成至少69人死亡、341人受伤
nodes.support_text: Then, the sound of tragedy. Without warning, a blast tore through the park, killing indiscriminately

nodes.description: 袭击者声称系巴基斯坦塔利班分支Jamat-ul-Ahrar所为
nodes.support_text: claimed by a splinter group of the Pakistani Taliban, known as Jamat-ul-Ahrar

nodes.description: 目击者描述爆炸导致人群恐慌，大量伤亡者被堵在公园入口
nodes.support_text: Everyone panicked, running to all directions. Many of them were blocked at the gate of the park. Dead bodies can be found everywhere

nodes.description: 救援人员从现场抬出大量尸体，伤者颈部和胸部遭受铁质物体贯穿伤
nodes.support_text: Rescue workers remove a body from the site of the blast. The object hit her looks like a piece of hard iron, and it burnt her in the neck

nodes.description: 拉合尔公园因安全原因关闭至周一
nodes.support_text: Parks in the city remained closed into Monday, for security reasons

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦总理纳瓦兹·谢里夫强烈谴责袭击
nodes.support_text: Pakistan's Prime Minister Muhammad Nawaz Sharif strongly condemned the blast

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦军方召开高规格会议，决定加强旁遮普省反恐行动
nodes.support_text: The two main military operations... with General Asim Bajwa tweeting that the Chief of Army Staff chaired a high-level security mtng at GHQ today

nodes.description: 印度总理莫迪与谢里夫通话表示哀悼，谴责袭击针对妇女儿童
nodes.support_text: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi... called Sharif on Sunday to express his grief

nodes.description: 美国、澳大利亚政府也谴责袭击，称系恐怖主义全球威胁
nodes.support_text: The United States and Australian governments also condemned the attack. 'This cowardly act...'

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦国内爆发支持Qadri的抗议活动，要求修改法律
nodes.support_text: Blasphemy law protests erupted again Sunday, almost a month after a former bodyguard who assassinated a moderate politician was executed

nodes.description: 2015年3月拉合尔Nishtar colony地区发生另一起针对基督徒的自杀袭击
nodes.support_text: In March last year, suicide bombers attacked a Christian community, also in Lahore, setting off two blasts that killed at least 14 people

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦政府发言人向CNN通报拉合尔公园自杀袭击事件
nodes.support_text: 当地政府发言人向CNN通报袭击事件

edges.support_text: Then, the sound of tragedy. Without warning, a blast tore through the park
claimed by a splinter group of the Pakistani Taliban
Everyone panicked, running to all directions
Pakistan's Prime Minister Muhammad Nawaz Sharif strongly condemned the blast
Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi... called Sharif on Sunday

Parks in the city remained closed into Monday
General Asim Bajwa tweeting that the Chief of Army Staff chaired a high-level security mtng
The United States and Australian governments also condemned the attack
